items.content:
This is an automatically generated changelog for release stable-20250914.

From previous stable version stable-20250907 there have been the following changes. One package per new version shown.

Major packages

Name Version
Kernel 6.15.9-201
Gnome 48.4-1
Mesa 25.1.7-1
Podman 5.6.0-1 ➡️ 5.6.1-1
Nvidia 580.82.07-2

Major DX packages

Name Version
Incus 6.15-1
Docker 28.4.0-1

Commits

Hash Subject
7d26c6b revert: "Add 'bluefin-gdx' to cleanup packages list" (#3203)
ff542ae Add 'bluefin-gdx' to cleanup packages list (#3200)
f329c41 feat: add docker-model-plugin to DX image packages (#3189)
d586263 Add missing image names to cleanup workflow for comprehensive registry cleanup (#3194)
4238092 feat: add GitHub Actions workflow for Copilot setup (#3193)
1b6fd70 fix(bazaar): disable custom theming on light mode (#3188)
7534709 Filter out .switcheroo suffix from package versions in changelogs (#3163)
ba679d3 fix: ISO build workflow to only build selected variants and correct flavor combinations (#3175)
34191a4 Enable Bluefin LTS HWE ISO builds (#3170)
7372452 Update maintainer guidelines in copilot instructions (#3171)
3274099 Add comprehensive Copilot onboarding instructions for improved coding agent efficiency (#3164)
7e9e9fe feat: replace Sudoku entry with new package (#3154)

✨ xevd-libs 0.5.0-1
